mapper.select: SELECT f.question_id AS questionId, q.title AS title, q.answer_count AS answerCount, q.like_count AS likeCount, q.favorite_count AS favoriteCount, f.created_at AS favoriteAt FROM qa_favorite f JOIN qa_question q ON q.id = f.question_id WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} AND q.delete_flag = 0 ORDER BY f.created_at DESC, f.id DESC
